techs: Action Cable - allows realtime comments/chat updates
longDescription: This is a Ruby on Rails application using ActionCable built using Behavior Driven Development and MVC design pattern. Allows for realtime chat via websockets.

cardDescription: Personal site built using React and hosted on Github

task.name: Features
directions: Major components built with scalability in mind

longDescription: This site was built using the site generator for React, GastbyJS.The application runs a production build hosted on Github. Every section of the site was built with scalability in mind. Data rendered in each section is being pulled in from it's respective JSON file. Contact Form is made up of different, reusable, form fields each responsible for validating the type of data that an user inputs. Portfolio page renders cards displaying conditionally rendered buttons/data depending on preference set in it's respective JSON
